name: Jigsaw With Animals
description:
Jigsaw With Animals - addictive jigsaw puzzle with cute pictures of animals, made in hand-drawn graphics.
In the game, 30 different, extremely cute, pictures are available to you, which are broken into small puzzles. To advance to the next level, you need to go through the previous one, collecting the picture together. Don't worry, at each level at the bottom of the screen there is a hint with which you can see the picture that should come out in the end. Enjoy cute cartoon animals by dragging and dropping puzzle pieces to complete a colorful picture in Jigsaw With Animals!
